config.directions: Move the slider to explore the timeline.

entries.content:
I am Servius Tullius, 6th king of Rome. I ruled from: 578 BCE–534 BCE. I am known for the following:
  • marriage to Tarquinia
  • prophecy by Tanaquil
  • creation of election by Senate
  • the Census
  • creation of five classes
  • the Servian Wall
  • murder of spouses by Tarquinius Superbus and Tullia Minor
entries.caption: Servius Tullius
entries.alt: Drawing of bust of Servius Tullius with Latin text underneath

entries.content:
I am Tarquinius Superbus, 7th king of Rome. I ruled from: c. 534 BCE–510 BCE. I am known for the following:
  • the assassination of Servius Tullius
  • distrust of nobles
  • creation of capital punishment
  • the Cloaca Maxima
  • the Cumaean Sibyl
  • Sextus/Lucretia
  • exile
entries.caption: Tarquinius Superbus
